hero.title: Create your own intelligent chatbot experience
hero.subtitle: No Coding experience, Quick Start!
hero.description: Our platform allows you to easily build and manage chatbots, supporting various applications, whether it's customer service, autoresponders, or e-commerce. Our platform meets your needs!

signPage.forgotPasswordHint: Enter your email address and we will send you a password reset email.
signPage.resetPasswordHint: Please enter your new password to reset.
signPage.notHaveAccount: Don't have an account? Sign Up
signPage.haveAccount: Already have an account? Sign In

botPage.webhookHint: The webhook URL will only be displayed upon creation. Please keep it safe.

notFoundPage.title: Page Not Found
notFoundPage.description: Oops! The page you are looking for doesn't exist. It may have been moved or deleted, or you may have entered an incorrect URL.

common.backToLoginHint: You will be redirected to the login page in five seconds, or you can click the button below to continue.

feature.faqDescription: The FAQ module integrates AI's RAG (Retrieval Augmented Generation) system, allowing real-time retrieval of relevant answers from the database and providing accurate and natural responses through generative technology. Whether it's frequently asked questions or specialized knowledge, this module effortlessly handles it and ensures that users receive satisfactory answers.
feature.ecommDescription: The e-commerce module uses AI-driven data analytics to help you track customer behavior, predict sales trends, and automatically generate customer feedback reports. This enables merchants to manage inventory effectively, improve conversion rates, and provide a personalized shopping experience.
feature.reservationDescription: The Reservation Module simplifies the management of various bookings and schedules. From the customer's perspective, the booking process is quick and straightforward, with notification support ensuring no important appointments are missed.

error.oauth_failed: Sorry, an error occurred while processing your OAuth request.
error.oauth_exist_hint: Please log in via email to bind to a third-party platform
error.email_format: Invalid email format, please enter a valid email address.
error.password_mismatch: Passwords do not match, please enter the same password.
error.user_not_found: User not found, please sign up.
error.unknown_error: An unexpected error occurred, please check your action and try again.
error.token_expired: Session expired, please log in again
